history.content:
https://ls.berkeley.edu/sites/default/files/advlatechangeclassschedule.pdf if you're in L&S. 

http://engineering.berkeley.edu/sites/default/files/docs/changes-after-deadline.pdf if you're in CoE.

Regarding how you got in... I'm going to speculate that people dropped right before the deadline, and the waitlist processes one last time around midnight (12:30, according to @4813) to let some people in.

I checked my waitlist status at midnight, and it seems that I was 3 on the waitlist. I forgot to drop the course, but, suddenly, I was put off the waitlist. How do I drop the course? I thought people cannot drop past midnight. How did I get off the waitlist?
history.subject: How do I drop an EDD course when it's past the early drop deadline?

history.content: I checked my waitlist status at midnight, and it seems that I was 3 on the waitlist. I forgot to drop the course, but, suddenly, I was put off the waitlist. How do I drop the course?
history.subject: How do I drop an EDD course when it's past the early drop deadline?
